about.title: About
about.content: I am a dedicated software engineer with a strong passion for front-end development, especially in creating dynamic and user-centric web applications using React. With a deep focus on performance, accessibility, and design, I aim to deliver scalable solutions that meet modern web standards. I enjoy learning about new technologies and applying them to improve user experiences.

list.description: Designed and developed a WordPress platform for photography services, focusing on user-friendly design and SEO optimization. Collaborated with a team to deliver a scalable solution for managing photography portfolios and client bookings.

Provided full-stack development services for various clients, focusing on custom web applications. Built solutions using React, Node.js, and GraphQL, ensuring performance and scalability for business needs.

list.name: Rules of 10000 hours
list.description: A project demonstrating the theory of mastering any skill with consistent effort over 10,000 hours. Built with responsive design and interactive elements for better user engagement.

list.name: Vending Machine
list.description: An interactive simulation of a vending machine. Implemented a user-friendly interface with dynamic behavior for a realistic experience, including payment and selection options.

list.name: Landing Page
list.description: Designed a responsive and visually appealing landing page for promoting a product or service. Integrated backend features to manage user data and interaction analytics.

list.name: Gamgyul Market
list.description: Developed an e-commerce platform for a local market. Features include product browsing, user authentication, and a shopping cart, with a seamless front-to-back integration.
